RelatedSentence: More Americans view extensive Washington experience as a negative trait in a presidential candidate than a positive one , according to a new poll , a marked turnaround from years past .

The Pew survey out Monday found that 30 % of Americans would be less likely to support a candidate with extensive experience in the capital , compared to just 19 % who said they 'd be more likely to support such a candidate .
